controller

Class ScenarioController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ScenarioController

  • public class ScenarioController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the user Scenarios, which include the predefined scenario examples, and user created scenarios. Any scenario changes (new, delete, change) will be announced to the DecisionMechanism to calculate which is the best AbstractAlgorithm to be used for the encapsulation in a Scenario.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DecisionMechanism decisionMechanism
      The decision mechanism has to be updated in case of scenario changes
      private java.util.Vector<Scenario> scenarios
      The list of all loaded user scenarios

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScenarioController(DecisionMechanism decisionMechanism)
      The constructor will load all user scenarios saved in the scenarios directory, as well as the predefined scenarios.

      • updateCriterionValueChange

        public void updateCriterionValueChange(Scenario scenario,
                              Criterion criterion)
        This will be called by the ScenarioQuestionnairePanel in case the user changed the value of a scenario criterion. This method will update the DecisionMechanism to adjust the distance calculation and therewith the high score.
        Parameters:

        criterion -
